name: The Chains that Bind Me
description:
A fight for your life after a robbery gone wrong.

STORY

Michael's favorite pastime, robbing houses, has been flipped on its head. After finding his next target, Michael enters the home of an elderly man. Little did Michael know what he was in for by choosing this house.
